caption: The man moves forward in the jungle, holding a gun, while the woman carries luggage and crosses over tree roots. They continue their journey. The woman hands something to the man, and he also passes some items to her. Near the base of a tree, the man accidentally slips and falls, getting his hands covered in mud. Suddenly, they look back. Then, the man and the woman run frantically forward. They come across a creature stuck in a mud pit and together, they manage to pull it out. The woman is frightened when she sees some animals feeding on another animal. The man embraces her. They sit down on the west side, and the man reveals a wound on his abdomen. The woman takes a water bottle and drinks some water.
